Tucson inches just a little bit closer to Drill Bit, with a heavy and serio=
us stance.=C2=A0 As each clawed foot touches the ground, dust kicks up just=
 from the mere action of him putting them down.=C2=A0 Claws click against t=
he surface of the cave's floor, as a thwapping of his tail can be heard as =
slaps against the hard surface it was coming in contact with.=C2=A0 
=C2=A0=

The dragon growls.
=C2=A0
" You heard my comrade.=C2=A0 Identify yourself.=
=C2=A0=C2=A0 Are you friend or foe?"

Respect those as you wish to be respe=
cted.


________________________________
From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonu=
s@...>
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Sent: Friday, December 16, 2011 6:=
44 PM
Subject: Re: Strange meetings in the Dark! (Tuscon, Vice Grip & Drill=
 Bit)


=C2=A0 
> <OLD - DRILLBIT>
>
> For the moment, as the PREDACON dug =
over through the tunnel, and hten
> popping out a moment later the PREDACON=
 transformed out of his beast mode
> over to his robot. "Maximals. YOu have=
 other whelps with you." Hissing
> over and holding his arms up in front of=
 him, his weapons charged but not
> shooting at them.

> <OLD - TUSCON>
>
>=

> Tucson continues to watch Drill Bit carefully. He also knew that his dra=
gon
> mode was a little bit more suited for dealing with strangers since it=
 was easy
> to ward them off as a large predator. He makes the transformati=
on as silently
> as possible and then remains hidden, but with a little bit=
 of a rumbling growl
> to his voice. It would be just enough to make himsel=
f heard and determined
> as an apex predator who is not to be toiled with.
=

> <NEW - VICE GRIP>
>
>
> For the moment, VICE GRIP stayed behind over DRI=
LL BIT as the Bugacon
> popped out into the cavern, and remained relatively=
 stealthed behind them,
> but at the close range in the tunnels he was fair=
ly easy to spot on, as well
> as his noted staying back and away, nots peak=
ing.

<NEW>

As the CYBERTRONIAN version of Mexican stand off was in the ma=
king BIG
CONVOY, BREAK and MACH KICK came around the bend to take in the sc=
ene,
the sound of charged weapons filling the air for a moment.

"Yes there=
 are other Maximals with him." BIG CONVOY said evenly as he
came to face th=
e new comers to the group."

BREAK chuckled, "The question is, who are you,=
 and should we blast ya or what?"

MACH KICK just chuckled as he looked bet=
ween TUSCON and BIG CONVOY
ready to back either one of them up should thing=
s turn nasty.

BIG CONVOY shook his head slightly in negation, "What are th=
e
Predacons doing in here, looking to work with Magmatron? Doing his
biddin=
g?"

It was always known that despite his fierce streak of independence
MAG=
MATRON was a Predacon at heart and some believed that he got his
start amon=
g the DECEPTICON ranks in the days long before the peace
accord working for=
 the original MEGATRON.

He had definitely spent some time working with thi=
s MEGATRON, but that
was long before the PREDACONS and MAXIMALS had actuall=
y come to the
EARTH itself.

(TAG)

- Preston
